description:
The Certified Software Test Engineer Test Certification is one of the oldest and most popular testing certifications around the world. It is recognized by more than 50 countries including the United States. This course is designed to prepare the software testing professional with an overview of the key concepts and principles that will be covered in the CSTE exam. Viewing this course should serve as a supplemental guide to the CSTE Common Body of Knowledge (CBOK) in which students will learn some of the following concepts:

  • Fundamentals of the testing process
  • Understanding test planning, test execution and test reporting
  • Understanding how to manage testing done by other parties including customers and other vendors
  • Fundamentals of testing emerging technologies, internal software controls and security
title: CSTE Prep Course
